message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  It's in great condition and worth a lot to the right person.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my initial asking price.  How about $11,000?  It's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with $10,500.
